episodes.description: In this episode, we'll be digging deeper into the samurai legacies that have been preserved throughout Japan. You might be able to touch a hidden aspect of the samurai culture like swordsmith.
episodes.subtitle: Samurai Legacy
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: From inns and hotels to coffee shops and subways, Japanese society is filled with the spirit of hospitality, called Omotenashi. It's all about making sure that people can live in peace and security.
episodes.subtitle: Country of Omotenashi
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: Japanese winter has given rise to some unique customs and recreational activities. In this episode, we'll dive into some of Japan's incredible winter wonderland.
episodes.subtitle: Japanese Winter Wonderland
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: The way Japanese live changes with the times, and so to do the things we use. In this new episode, we will deep look into the world of items used for daily life in Japan.
episodes.subtitle: Everyday Tradition
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: Japan has come up with all kinds of ways to avert disaster. Today we look at the spiritual side of the equation with various ways to ward off evil. And we pray for the health of people of the world.
episodes.subtitle: Warding Off Evil
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: It's been a year since the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic and efforts continue to alleviate the crisis. Join us on our new episode for a look into how Japan is responding to the challenge.
episodes.subtitle: Pandemic Solutions
episodes.title: Dig More Japan
